mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no, l.lecture_time, l.lecture_starttime, l.lecture_endtime, l.lecture_day, l.classroom_no, se.semester_session, s.subject_no, s.subject_name, s.subject_point, s.subject_grade, m.major_no, m.major_name FROM lecture l inner join subject s ON s.subject_no = l.subject_no INNER JOIN major m ON m.major_no = s.major_no INNER JOIN semester se ON l.semester_no = se.semester_no where l.semester_no = ( SELECT semester_no FROM semester WHERE semester_year = YEAR(NOW()) AND semester_session = round(MONTH(NOW())/6) ) ORDER BY l.lecture_no limit #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT g.user_id, g.sign_state, g.sign_no, l.lecture_no, l.lecture_starttime, l.lecture_endtime, l.lecture_day, l.classroom_no, s.subject_name, s.subject_point, s.subject_grade FROM sign g INNER JOIN lecture l ON l.lecture_no = g.lecture_no INNER JOIN subject s ON s.subject_no = l.subject_no WHERE g.user_id= #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sign_cancel( sign_no, user_id, cancel_date, lecture_no, cancel_id ) VALUES ( #{signNo}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{lectureNo}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT sc.user_id, sc.lecture_no, sc.cancel_id, s.subject_name, DATE_FORMAT(sc.cancel_date,'%Y-%m-%d') cancel_date FROM sign_cancel sc INNER JOIN lecture l ON sc.lecture_no = l.lecture_no INNER JOIN subject s ON l.subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE sc.user_id =#{userId}
SELECT ifnull(SUM(l.lecture_time),0) lectureTime FROM sign s INNER JOIN lecture l ON s.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.sign_state = '1'

SELECT * FROM sign s INNER JOIN lecture l ON s.lecture_no = l.lecture_no INNER JOIN subject sb ON l.subject_no = sb.subject_no WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.sign_state = 1 AND sb.subject_no = ( SELECT l.subject_no FROM lecture l WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} )
SELECT * FROM sign s INNER JOIN lecture l ON s.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND l.lecture_day = ( SELECT lecture_day FROM lecture l WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo})
